title: Bhagavad Gita is above all, don’t mix it with Bible: Karnataka minister on Bible row - India Today
content:
1. Bhagavad Gita is above all, don’t mix it with Bible: Karnataka minister on Bible row  India Today
  2. Mangaluru: No preaching Bible, Quran in schools – Education minister B C Nagesh  Daijiworld.com
  3. Bhagavad Gita not a religious book like Quran, Bible: Karnataka Education Min  The News Minute
  4. Karnataka Bible row: Don't need petty politics, says Bengaluru school principal  India Today
  5. Karnataka move to inspect syllabus of Christian schools likely to stir controversy  Daijiworld.com
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Karnataka Education Minister BC Nagesh on Wednesday issued a statement saying that the Bhagavad Gita was "not a religious book" and it "should not be mixed with the Bible". This comes a day after Clarence school in Bengaluru was issued a show cause notice by the Karnataka government for its decision to mandate the teachings of the Bible.
